Daylogic Purifying Gel Overnight Masque (2019 formulation)

Brand: Daylogic

Category: Mask

Brand: Daylogic

Category: Mask

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), PROPYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, HYALURONIC ACID, SILANETRIOL, DIETHYLHEXYL CARBONATE, POLYGLYCERYL-4 LAURATE, DILAURYL CITRATE, CARBOMER, PANTHENOL, ANANAS SATIVUS (PINEAPPLE) FRUIT EXTRACT, PHENOXYETHANOL, CHLORPHENESIN, GLUCONOLACTONE, SODIUM POLYACRYLATE, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
